channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- PHP Runtime for Apache OpenWhisk
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- PHP Runtime for Apache OpenWhisk

item.title: CVE-2018-11756|2024-08-05T08:17:09.107Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- php%20runtime%20for%20apache%20openwhisk
item.description: In PHP Runtime for Apache OpenWhisk, a Docker action inheriting one of the Docker tags openwhisk/action-php-v7.2:1.0.0 or openwhisk/action-php-v7.1:1.0.1 (or earlier) may allow an attacker to replace the user function inside the container if the user code is vulnerable to code exploitation.
